name: Metamundo
description: What is the project about? METAMUNDO is a digital real estate platform that leverages Web3.0 technology. The project aims to connect digital assets with tangible assets, such as real estate, using blockchain technology. This connection is intended to improve the efficiency, transparency, and fairness of the real estate market. What makes your project unique? METAMUNDO introduces several unique concepts. One of these is the INTERMUNDO service, a Web3.0-based digital real estate service that allows users to participate directly via the blockchain network and receive rewards in the form of MMT tokens History of your project. The METAMUNDO project was launched in May 2023 by a team based in South Korea. The team, led by CEO Gideon Yune, has extensive experience in blockchain and real estate. Since its launch, the METAMUNDO platform has evolved to include various services aimed at improving the real estate market. Whatâ€™s next for your project? While the provided document does not outline specific future plans for METAMUNDO, the project's roadmap suggests continued development and expansion of its services. This may include further development of the INTERMUNDO service, expansion of the Global Blockchain Cluster NFT service, and ongoing efforts to improve the platform's efficiency, transparency, and fairness. What can your token be used for? The MMT token, METAMUNDO's native cryptocurrency, plays a key role within the platform.
